data.label: Marinara
data.description: Italian tomato sauce, made with tomatoes, garlic, herbs, and onions.

data.label: Alfredo
data.description: Made of butter, heavy cream, and Parmesan cheese, with generous grindings of pepper to help add spark to all that richness.

data.label: Bianca
data.description: No sauce! A covering of garlic, olive oil and herbs, topped with mozzarella cheese
